answers.answer: Hello,Do you have a more specific question?There are many issues that can arise from high blood sugars, or low blood sugars.Low blood sugars can occur in type 1 if too much insulin is injected.  It can shaking, hunger, confusion, even unconsciousness.High blood sugar may not have immediate symptoms, depending on how high the blood sugar is.  But symptom may include thirst, frequent urination, skin infections, urinary tract infections, irritation, kidney damage.  If blood sugars are too high for a long period, the person may become very ill (diabetic ketoacidosis), and may even die if medication attention is not sought in time.

question: Need to know about major Diabetes issuessymtoms
title: Need to know about major Diabetes issues
